Introduction

HOT ISSUE was a girl group under S2 Entertainment. The group debuted on April 28, 2021, with their first extended play, "Issue Maker."

On March 16, 2021, S2 Entertainment revealed the group's name and logo. S2 Entertainment, led by Hong Seung Sung, co-founder and former chairman of Cube Entertainment, stated that the name HOT stands for "Honest," "Outstanding," and "Terrific," reflecting the group's aspiration to make an impact in the music industry.

After four months of no updates, S2 Entertainment announced on April 22, 2022, that the group had disbanded, six days before their debut anniversary. The decision followed extended discussions regarding the group's future and direction.
